name: Final Fantasy XV Ultimate Collector's Edition
summary:
The Ultimate Collector’s Edition of Final Fantasy XV includes: 
 
- Exclusive Steelbook 
- Kingsglaive: Final Fantasy Movie Blu-ray 
- Bonus Content 
- Royal Raiment Outfit 
- Weapon: Masasume (FFXV) 
- Recolor: Platinum Leviathan 
- Hardcover 192 Page Artbook 
- Exclusive Play Arts Kai Noctis Action Figure 
- In Game Items Travel Pack, Camera Kit, Angler Set, Gourmand Set 
- Soundtrack Music 
- Ultimate Collectors Edition Exclusive Steelbook 
- Brotherhood Blu-Ray (containing an additional bonus scene)
